snippet: Social Inclusion has arrived at Pimlico Race Course in preparation to take on the Kentucky Derby winner California Chrome in the Preakness.
abstract: Social Inclusion arrives at Pimlico Race Course in preparation to take on Kentucky Derby winner California Chrome in the Preakness.
lead_paragraph: Social Inclusion has arrived at Pimlico Race Course in preparation to take on the Kentucky Derby winner California Chrome in the Preakness.
